creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: roughly ovoid shape with straight sides; openwork gold border; Star of David at bottom; dome with 3 characters at top; leaves and gold and red stone "berries" at L; gold chain; Hebrew text on back
dimension: 2 3/8 x 1 7/8 x 1/4 in. (6.03 x 4.76 x 0.64 cm) (pendant only)
markings: on back, stamped: [ISRAEL/ ME/ HANDMADE/ BY M. ENDE/ (sack)/ SILVER/ (lion)]
title: Pendant on chain
